meanings.definition: A person who gives away a gift that they have received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a regifter who always passes on presents to others.
meanings.sent2: The regifter at the party gave me a book that she had received last week.
meanings.sent3: The regifter in our group is known for spreading joy with her thoughtful gifts.
meanings.sent4: Being a regifter is like being a messenger of happiness, sharing the joy of presents.
meanings.sent5: The regifter's act of kindness made everyone smile and feel appreciated.

meanings.definition: To give away a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: I decided to regifter the scarf I got for my birthday to my sister.
meanings.sent2: She regifted the perfume to her friend because she already had a similar one.
meanings.sent3: He regifted the ugly sweater to his brother, hoping he would appreciate it more.
meanings.sent4: Regifting the necklace felt like passing on a piece of love to a dear friend.
meanings.sent5: She planned to regifter the chocolates to her coworker as a token of gratitude.
